title: Hour 2 - Deshaun Watson Update, Nick Wright
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Deshaun Watson Update, Nick Wright
description:
Dan gives an update on the Deshaun Watson hearing now on day 3. And Nick Wright stops by to chime in on Draymond Green's latest comments about Kevin Durant.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
